daily_fact: Today in NYC: A rare luxury liner was spotted in the waters off the city, reminding us of the beauty and history that surrounds us.
topline_md: Recent updates in NYC include Curtis Sliwa hiring armed security due to threats, a high-rise building partially collapsing without injuries, and a Brooklyn woman being attacked during a burglary. Additionally, a man was charged after a lockdown at Hudson Yards, and a triple shooting occurred in the Bronx.

risks_alerts.summary_md:
### Risks & Alerts
